name: CustomMaterial.Specular
desc: An object that defines the specular highlights of an entity.

items.name: init(floatLiteral: Float)
items.desc: Creates an object from a single value.

items.name: init(scale: Float, texture: CustomMaterial.Texture?)
items.desc: Creates an object from a single value, a UV-mapped texture, or both.

items.name: init(PhysicallyBasedMaterial.Specular)
items.desc: Creates an object from a physically based material’s specular property.

items.name: var scale: Float
items.desc: The specular value for the entire entity or a multiplier for values sampled from the material’s texture.

items.name: var texture: CustomMaterial.Texture?
items.desc: The specular value as a UV-mapped image texture.

items.name: typealias CustomMaterial.Specular.FloatLiteralType
items.desc: The type used to specify a single specular value for this material.
